title: Sausage and Mash
content:
Sausage and Mash is a category of item. It can be cooked in The Delectable Dab Kitchen in Hopeport using the Chef profession. Recipes for the Chef profession can be found in the Chef Recipe Book. Sausage and Mash can be sold to Head Chef.


 * Basic Sausage and Mash
 * Appetizing Sausage and Mash
 * Fine Sausage and Mash
 * Tasty Sausage and Mash
 * Delicious Sausage and Mash
 * Gourmet Sausage and Mash
